metadata.name: A Clockwork Orange
metadata.description: An artwork of Alex in Clockwork orange by Stanley Kubrick. As sir Alfred Hitchcock said, no one will not afraid of sudden bomb blowing but what about you see it counting down? Some crimes done by persons that we don’t expect and this is so more frightened. Like some person’s that made by wood and it’s counting down toward our eyes. This work has done in combination of Digital painting and 2D and 3D animation that created by cooperation of some artists. And it took more than a month to complete this piece Paint : $obhan Music : farbod bijani Motion and 3D : Morteza tangsiri
